backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining content types, storage maps, access control, and preview workflow for courses, gallery images, reviews, contact info, and homepage content.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing features, associated files, components, and test IDs for build-info, diagnostics, and preview-refresh functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, pages, hooks, assets, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind OKLCH theme variables and dark mode values defining the red–white–black color system, plus base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the app root, favicon, preload assets, fonts, and the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router setup using TanStack Router with page routes and a ThemeProvider wrapper.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Reusable logo component showing the HR Academy logo with optional text and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying branding, contact details, quick links, and build-info values using data from backend queries.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links, contact scroll behavior, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/HomeGallerySecti: Displays featured gallery images with loading and empty states and links to full gallery.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app with header, footer, preview banner, and applies pending contact scroll.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication and clearing cached queries.
frontend/src/components/PreviewBanner.ts: Shows a preview-mode alert for admins with option to exit preview.
frontend/src/constants/brandAssets.ts: Exports the canonical brand logo asset path.
frontend/src/constants/buildInfo.ts: Provides build version and timestamp constants with a formatter function.
frontend/src/constants/missionAssets.ts: Empty placeholder for mission-related asset constants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and caching of backend actors tied to identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactScroll.ts: Handles smooth scrolling to the contact section and pending scroll logic across navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication with login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreviewMode.ts: Determines preview mode based on URL and admin status and offers enter/exit preview helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating courses, gallery images, contact info, reviews, and related data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, global CSS variables for theming, and custom accent-red utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements a comprehensive admin dashboard for managing courses, gallery images, contact info, reviews, and homepage content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with inquiry form, contact details, social links, and international student section.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Displays all courses grouped by category with loading skeletons and styled category badges.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a gallery grid of uploaded images with hover captions and fallback placeholders when empty.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page component displaying hero content, highlights, gallery, contact info, and a user review submission form with preview-mode support.
frontend/src/utils/refreshPreview.ts: Utility function that clears caches and unregisters service workers before forcing a full page reload to refresh stale previews.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support and persistence utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending color themes, animations, containers, and plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current build issues, feature status, and pending requests for the HR ACADEMY web application.
